definition: big/stream or canal/drain/ditch/CL:條|条[tiao2]/him (dialect)/outer rim of a carriage wheel (old)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: All the main channels are in effect controlled by the Kremlin.
sentences.chinese: 主要的新聞渠道實際由克林姆林宮掌控。

sentences.english: Firstly make sure that you are well represented in all key channels.
sentences.chinese: 首先請確保你在所有主要的渠道中擁有良好的表現。

sentences.english: The channel of communication is smooth.
sentences.chinese: 溝通的渠道也是暢通的。

sentences.english: Financing is difficult in the commercial forest market in China.
sentences.chinese: 目前中國商品林市場融資困難，渠道匱乏。

sentences.english: But perhaps Cleopatra got the poison another way.
sentences.chinese: 不過也許克利奧帕特拉有其它的渠道得到毒藥。

sentences.english: We have to work through channels that already exist.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須通過現有渠道開展工作。

sentences.english: Budweiser is now a wholesale channel in Tianjin have occupied 90% of the share.
sentences.chinese: 現在百威在天津量販式渠道已經佔據了90%的份額。

sentences.english: We will ensure an adequate supply of agricultural products and increase farmers’ incomes through multiple channels.
sentences.chinese: 確保農產品供給，多渠道增加農民收入。

sentences.english: It then runs along channels to different parts of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 水沿着渠道流往菜園的各個部分。

sentences.english: Nisar says there were very limited investment avenues for Muslims.
sentences.chinese: 尼薩爾說，穆斯林的投資渠道非常有限。

sentences.english: We can obtain the same quality through another channel at much lower price than that you quoted us.
sentences.chinese: 我方可以以比你方報價低的價格從其他渠道購買商品。

sentences.english: The chapter 3 demonstrates the mode transformation course of TCL white household electrical appliance distributing channel.
sentences.chinese: 第3章是分析TCL白家電渠道分銷模式的演變過程。

sentences.english: Much of China’s epic stimulus was channelled through its banks.
sentences.chinese: 中國宏大的經濟刺激計劃多半以銀行爲渠道。

sentences.english: So, his article has further discussed the furniture industry marketing channel's control management.
sentences.chinese: 本文接着進一步探討了傢俱業營銷渠道的控制管理。

sentences.english: Word of mouth is now the number one marketing channel.
sentences.chinese: 口碑相傳正成爲第一位的市場溝通渠道。

sentences.english: Even to grab channel, include to fight the circumstance of affray has.
sentences.chinese: 甚至爲了搶渠道，包括打架鬥毆的情況都有。

definition: to open access/to establish contact/to remove a block/to put through (a phone connection)
